mapper.sql: id, shop_id, shop_name, product_code, supplies_code, supplies_describe, one_cate_id, one_cate_desc, two_cate_id, two_cate_desc, three_cate_id, three_cate_desc, four_cate_id, four_cate_desc, brand_id, brand_name, weight, stage, concerns, pic_url, gmt_created, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, version
mapper.insert:
insert into moneyfeed.pc_ad_product (shop_id, shop_name, product_code, supplies_code, supplies_describe, one_cate_id, one_cate_desc, two_cate_id, two_cate_desc, three_cate_id, three_cate_desc, four_cate_id, four_cate_desc, brand_id, brand_name, weight, stage, concerns, pic_url, gmt_created, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, version ) values
(#{model.shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.suppliesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.suppliesDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.oneCateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.oneCateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.twoCateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.twoCateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.threeCateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.threeCateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.fourCateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.fourCateDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.concerns,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{model.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{model.creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model.modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, 0 )
